  "Broker Comment" : "HIS CLAIM OF MISREPRESENTATION IS ERRONEOUS. I MADE NO MISREPRESENTATION OF THE NATIONWIDE ANNUITY WHICH THE CLIENT PURCHASED. IN ORDER TO DO THIS HE HAD TO ANSWER ALL INSURANCE AND ANNUITY QUESTIONS, SIGN AN ANNUITY APP, SIGN A RIDER APP, SELECT HIS INVESTMENT ALLOCATION, SIGN AN ANNUITY DISCLOSER FORM, AND SIGN A STATE REPLACEMENT FORM. HE RECEIVED AND REVIEWED WITH ME ALL SALES MATERIALS, PROSPECTUSES, AND HIS POLICY. THE INVESTMENT MET ALL HIS DISCLOSED FINANCIAL NEEDS AND STATED OBJECTIVES."
}
